caption.p: Effect of daidzein on production of lipid peroxide. MDCK cells were inoculated with influenza A/PR/8/34 virus at a MOI of 0.001. Lipid fraction was harvested from MDCK cells at 24 h post-infection. (A) 7β-OHCh, (B) tHODE, (C) 8-iso-PGF 2α, (D) 12-HETE, (E) 15-HETE, and (F) 5-HETE in cells. Data are presented as mean ± SD ( n = 3). Data are representative of three independent experiments. * p<0.01, ** p<0.005.
